String.string: Dagon's Treasure
"Sure, I can do that."
"You can count on me."
See Ibar in Frontera.
"I'll get them."
Talk to Nedisia on the first level of the Temple of Dagon.
Open treasure chests in the Chambers of Avarice and Malice.
Bring the pirate's treasure chests to Nedisia.
"That makes sense."
See Wekrine in the Chambers of Corruption.
I smell a thief!
Get away from that!
Defeat the Dagonite templars in the Chambers of Mighty Souls and collect their skins.
Bring the rough naga skin to Wekrine.
Take the rough naga skin to Wekrine.
"Consider it done."
See Valren in the Depths of Corruption.
"I'll get it from him, then."
Open the priest's treasure chests in the Depths of Corruption. Take the nagas' holy treasures.
Bring the nagas' holy treasure chests to Valren.
Book of Rituals
Defeat Resaltuuk on the east side of the Depths of Corruption. Take the Book of Rituals.
Report back to Valren on the third level.
Use the <A href="markmap:loc=7013#-70592,53748,57&type=1&name=teleportal">teleportal to travel to Dagon's Chantry. Defeat Skuldarik.
Activate the Relic of Dagon, and take the Cerulean Gem.
Bring the Cerulean Gem to Valren.
